scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run ganache:start" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:start" --names "GANACHE,BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green,cyan"
scripts.frontend:start: cd frontend && set PORT=3000&& npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd contracts && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install
